C D E G M P R S W 

R

resetPos() - Method in class WordRecord
Synchronized method that sets the Y position back to zero
resetScore() - Method in class Score
Synchronized method to set all the instance variables to 0 when the game is over or restarted
resetWord() - Method in class WordRecord
This is a synchronized and locked method occurs when a word has been either caught by a user or missed by the user.
run() - Method in class WordApp.WordCatcher
Run method that will iterate through the array of WordRecords use the WordRecord matchWord() method to evaluate if the user has correctly typed in a word If the user has correctly typed the word - the score will be incremented and the word will be reset using the resetWord() method
run() - Method in class WordPanel
This is the run method for the panel of the GUI.
run() - Method in class WordPanel.wordFalling
This is the run() method that will be activated once the panel starts this as an individual thread.
